version_description:
• Improved support of iOS 7 and iOS 9
• More precise calculation of the areas covered by meteorological radars
• Bug fixes of and improvements of application and In-App purchase mechanism

• Improved support of iOS 7 and iOS 9
• More precise calculation of the areas covered by meteorological radars
• Bug fixes of and improvements of application and In-App purchase mechanism

• Updated cloud animation: see rain cloud images for the past 2, 6 and even 24 hours (premium feature)
• Added Spanish, German, French and Italian translations
• Full-screen and landscape modes are available for all
• Welcome screen that explains

Finally! Rain alerts! Both down-to-minute and in-radius rain and snow alerts available. Be notified about approaching storm without launching the app.

And more features:
• Separate colors for the snow (Beta).
• Nexrad Level-III, Rainbow @ SEL
New Universal Blue and Black & White color schemes, Polish language and support of the new iPhone X. By the way, now you can use Premium Features for free, check the Upgrade page.

And more features:
• Separate colors for the snow (Beta).

Finally! Rain alerts! Both down-to-minute and in-radius rain and snow alerts available. Be notified about approaching storm without launching the app.

And more features:

• Nexrad Level-III, Rainbow @ SEL

5-minute map update interval (Premium Feature). Maps for past 6 and 24 hours updates faster: 10 and 15 minutes accordingly.

Also:
• Doesn't crash on the big zoom levels
• Track of your location for the notifications in the background
• Fix

5-minute map update interval (Premium Feature). Maps for past 6 and 24 hours updates faster: 10 and 15 minutes accordingly.

Also:
• Doesn't crash on the big zoom levels
• Track of your location for the notifications in the background
• Fix

• Improved app launch time.
• Dynamic opacity is disabled by default now.
• In-app reward allows you to enable all the Premium Features for free but keeps the advertisement. Only the in-app purchase completely removes ads in the app.

• Bug fixes and performance improvements
• Translation updates. Big thanks to all our translation contributors!

• Fixed autoplay animation at launch
• Various bug fixes

• Added ability to customize the intervals between frames in Single Radar mode.
• Added ability to change animation resolution size (native, full HD, social media, square).
• Fixed issue with radar animation video sharing on iOS 9.

Single radar site mode: allows you to view images immediately as they became available on the server for selected weather radar.

Also:
• Open Street Maps as a background map (beta)
• Scrollable upgrade screen, now you can buy or restore purch

Six. SIX new features:

• Ability to view observations for the past 48 hours and customize time intervals. Now 1h, 2h, 3h, 6h, 12h, 24h, and 48h past hours ranges are available to display.
• New time slider with unified one-minute accuracy at an

Six. SIX new features:

• Ability to view observations for the past 48 hours and customize time intervals. Now 1h, 2h, 3h, 6h, 12h, 24h, and 48h past hours ranges are available to display.
• New time slider with unified one-minute accuracy at an

• Fixed issue with the data updates. The new map updates appear almost immediately after creating on the servers.
• Restored Valerio color scheme's colors. The new colors were moved to the "Modified Valerio" color scheme.
• Solved issue with the emp

• Fixed issue with the data updates. The new map updates appear almost immediately after creating on the servers.
• Restored Valerio color scheme's colors. The new colors were moved to the "Modified Valerio" color scheme.
• Solved issue with the emp

• Changed the "Rainbow @ SELEX-SI" color scheme.
• "Snow (Beta)" and "Haptic feedback for the time slider" options are turned on by default.
• Updated translations.

• Changed the "Rainbow @ SELEX-SI" color scheme.
• "Snow (Beta)" and "Haptic feedback for the time slider" options are turned on by default.
• Updated translations.

• Fixed the issue which produced crash at the app launching.
• Universal links support
• Notification about the expiration of free month of Premium Features.
• Armenian translation.

• Universal links support
• Notification about the expiration of free month of Premium Features.
• Armenian translation.

• Share weather radar animation (mp4 or gif formats, white and dark color schemes).
• Enhanced color scheme with 120 colors instead of only 24.
• Improved Single Radar Mode loading time.

• All-new design that adopts the latest trends.
• Future radar map to plan your day ahead.
• Precipitation chart for the next hour for over 90 countries.
• Accurate rain forecast for the next 90 minutes.
• Weather forecast: temperature and wea

• Future radar map to plan your day ahead.
• Precipitation chart for the next hour for over 90 countries.
• Accurate rain forecast for the next 90 minutes.
• Weather forecast: temperature and wea

• Fixed radar overlay rendering issues on iOS 12.4.
• Refresh push notification token for rain alerts delivery.
• Able to do long-tap on the map to create a new favorite place from both "Locations" and "Settings" screens.

• Fixed radar overlay rendering issues on iOS 12.4.
• Refresh push notification token for rain alerts delivery.
• Able to do long-tap on the map to create a new favorite place from both "Locations" and "Settings" screens.

• Added the option for the time interval for radar data on the settings screen; now you can choose "past + forecast", "past", or just "forecast".
• Full-screen mode by a single tap on the map
• Rain alerts now are allowed to enable for any available

• Added the option for the time interval for radar data on the settings screen; now you can choose "past + forecast", "past", or just "forecast".
• Full-screen mode by a single tap on the map
• Rain alerts now are allowed to enable for any available

• Widgets for iOS 14.
• Premium settings.
• Special weather icons for night time.

• Widgets for iOS 14.
• Premium settings.
• Special weather icons for night time.

• Fixed crash of RainViewer for Apple Watch.
• Improved the "No upcoming precipitation" screen on the Apple Watch app.

• Fixed crash of RainViewer for Apple Watch.
• Improved the "No upcoming precipitation" screen on the Apple Watch app.

• Weather widget with radar map display is now available for the iOS14 users. Get updates on storm direction every 10 mins.
• Change the location for any RainViewer weather widget. Select favorite locations to display the forecast on the home screen.

• Weather widget with radar map display is now available for the iOS14 users. Get updates on storm direction every 10 mins.
• Change the location for any RainViewer weather widget. Select favorite locations to display the forecast on the home screen.

• Added splash screen.
• Optimized the performance of location services on both main app and widget.
• Time zone support added.
• Bug fixes.

Thank you for using RainViewer! We’re working on something big, but for now, we've fixed some important issues:
• The Apple Watch app can now receive the current location both for the Always and While Using access modes.
